definitions.definition: The state of being normal or usual ; normalcy .
examples: Jessie was going to wear pants to school, but her brother persuaded her to wear shorts to preserve normality .

definitions.definition: The concentration of a solution expressed in gram equivalent weights of solute per litre of solution .
A measure of how well an observed distribution approximates a normal distribution .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The state of being normal or usual ; normalcy .
secondary_definitions: ( chemistry ) The concentration of a solution expressed in gram equivalent weights of solute per litre of solution .
( countable , mathematics , statistics ) A measure of how well an observed distribution approximates a normal distribution .
